channel.title: essays on the dubious monk

item.title: cyclocross
item.description: Cyclocross (also cyclo-cross, ‘cross or cx) is my favourite discipline of riding bikes. There are a bunch of reasons for that, which I’ll be detailing below, along with some history and further reading1 by people who know more than me. cyclocross as a sport So you know about riding a bike right? Bikes have two wheels and pedals and handlebars to steer. The important thing you learn as a kid is how to balance and then off you go.
